Mauricio Palau
Technical Writer

Driving software success through actionable documentation

What I do

I create clear and concise documentation to guide users and developers in setting up and using software.

Technical writing services I offer:

Manuals and Guides

Aid users in using software products and services.

API Documentation

Aid developers in integrating and utilizing APIs effectively.

Copywriting

Engage and persuade users through compelling written content.

Content Strategy

Implement strategies for consistent updates to documentation.

User Experience Writing

Enhance software usability with clear user interface text.

Information Architecture

Organize content to ensure efficient information retrieval.

Knowledge Management

Implement systems to manage and facilitate access to content.

Training and Support Materials

Develop tutorials and articles for training and support.
